channel.title: Server offline? o.0
channel.description:
hi ive had a server for around 4 month now its al been good but i went on holiday came back turned it on tryed to put it back on serverstatus now it keeps saying its offline im not saying im the best person with server but i am pritty god i have made my own server etc but some how i tryed everything and my server just wont go online it says its online on the no-ip system but not on mopar
if you help tyvm

Can be a bit funny at times though, I honestly dont know, i never really use MSS, I just tend to go on Like google, youtube etc,

item.description:
@BeforeHell wrote:

Hmm, Then, That is quite a problem…

Erm, i know it may sound a Bit, Weird,

Does your server still work though? Does it still connect you to it and people join it?

Otherwise it may be Mopar Serverside problems…

i tryed all that some how it still isnt working

my no-ip says its online i try to pute on mopar but nothing emm anyother suggestion??

and what realy anoyes me its been on and off for the past 4 monthes and now it aint working

item.title: Server offline? o.0
item.dc:creator: @BeforeHell BeforeHell
item.description:
@BeforeHell wrote:

My Mates Had This problem,

He Just Took It Off Mopars Server Status, Just Basicly Refreshed everything, take down the serv momentarily, Turn it back on, Run Serv, And repost it, should all come back on

Reply If This Helps!

~Beforehell

Read full topic
